about_the_game:
"SHI SHI TE NA O-Even in Death-Demo" Now Available!

In this demo, you can play the early stages of the horror stealth action game "SHI SHI TE NA O-Even in Death-." Step into a creepy and surreal world and experience the beginning of the story

Features of the Demo

  • Tension-Filled Stealth Gameplay
    As you are pursued by strange beings known as "Ochibito," you will need to keep your footsteps quiet, crouch to hide, and hold your breath to survive. Understanding the characteristics of the Ochibito and analyzing their movements carefully will be key to staying alive.

  • Explore the Apartment Complex Area
    You can explore the "Apartment Complex" area, a part of the full game. This area evokes a sense of nostalgia but also carries an eerie atmosphere that will immerse you in the beginning of the story.

・It is strongly recommended to play with headphones to accurately gauge enemy positions and actions through sound.

・The game is produced in full HD.

Created using "Action Game Maker MV."

Guidelines for Videos, Streams, and Image Posting

You are welcome to create videos or live streams using "SHI SHI TE NA O-Even in Death-" for both commercial and non-commercial purposes. We hope you enjoy sharing this unique world with your viewers.

Monetization

You are free to monetize your content using the monetization features provided by video streaming platforms.

Game Title & Store Page Link

When posting videos or streams, please include the game title and the Steam store page URL so that viewers can access more information about the game.

Prohibited Actions

The following actions are strictly prohibited:

  • Streaming or posting content with the intention of defaming the game or its developers.

  • Posting videos or streams that severely disrupt the game’s atmosphere or experience.

  • Posting discriminatory, obscene, or otherwise inappropriate content that violates public decency.

  • Posting content for the purpose of religious, political, or anti-social activities.

name: シシテナオ-Even in Death- demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WindowsR 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WindowsR 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i9 3.6GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: [SHI SHI TE NA O-Even in Death-Demo] is a challenging horror stealth action game where the protagonist, a young girl, attempts to escape from a creepy world filled with creatures.
supported_languages:
English, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
